casebody.data:
Sparks, receiver, v. Atlanta & Florida Railroad Co. These cases are controlled by the decision in Central Trust Co. of New York et al. v. Thurman et al., this day announced. October 4, 1894.

Argued at the last term. Jenkins, Judge, presiding in lieu of Lumpkin, Justice, disqualified.

Interventions. Before John L. Hopkins, judge pro hac vice. Fulton superior court. September term, 1893. Gustin, Guerry & Hall, for plaintiff in error. H. B. Tompkins, Payne & Tye et al., contra.

Judgment affirmed.
